result.orig: Tá ballbhrú orm anseo Sin an áit ar bhuail mé mo lámh ar dhoras an chairr

result.ponchtml: Tá ballḃrú orm anseo Sin an áit ar ḃuail mé mo láṁ ar ḋoras an ċairrI have a bruise here. That is the place where I hit my hand on the car door.

result.eng: I have a bad pain there.
result.ga: Tá drochphian orm ansin
result.orig: Tá drochphian orm ansin
result.html: Tá drochphian orm ansinI have a bad pain there.
result.ponchtml: Tá droċṗian orm ansinI have a bad pain there.

result.eng: I am improving.
result.ga: Tá feabhas ag teacht orm
result.orig: Tá feabhas ag teacht orm
result.html: Tá feabhas ag teacht ormI am improving.
result.ponchtml: Tá feaḃas ag teaċt ormI am improving.

result.eng: The medication makes me tired.
result.ga: Cuireann an cógas tuirse orm
result.orig: Cuireann an cógas tuirse orm
result.html: Cuireann an cógas tuirse ormThe medication makes me tired.
result.ponchtml: Cuireann an cógas tuirse ormThe medication makes me tired.

result.eng: I have a cold.
result.ga: Tá slaghdán orm
result.orig: Tá slaghdán orm
result.html: Tá slaghdán ormI have a cold.
result.ponchtml: Tá slaġdán ormI have a cold.

result.eng: I'm sorry to hear that.
result.ga: Tá brón orm sin a chloisteáil
result.orig: Tá brón orm sin a chloisteáil
result.html: Tá brón orm sin a chloisteáilI'm sorry to hear that.
result.ponchtml: Tá brón orm sin a ċloisteáilI'm sorry to hear that.

result.eng: I am tired!
result.ga: Tá tuirse orm
result.orig: Tá tuirse orm
result.html: Tá tuirse ormI am tired!
result.ponchtml: Tá tuirse ormI am tired!

result.eng: I am hungry, Mommy!
result.ga: Tá ocras orm a Mhama
result.orig: Tá ocras orm a Mhama
result.html: Tá ocras orm a MhamaI am hungry, Mommy!
result.ponchtml: Tá ocras orm a ṀamaI am hungry, Mommy!

result.eng: I am sorry, but I am extremely tired and the weather is awful.
result.ga: Tá brón orm ach tá tuirse an domhain orm agus tá an aimsir uafásach
result.orig: Tá brón orm ach tá tuirse an domhain orm agus tá an aimsir uafásach
result.html: Tá brón orm ach tá tuirse an domhain orm agus tá an aimsir uafásachI am sorry, but I am extremely tired and the weather is awful.
result.ponchtml: Tá brón orm aċ tá tuirse an doṁain orm agus tá an aimsir uafásaċI am sorry, but I am extremely tired and the weather is awful.

result.eng: I'm sorry, but I cannot come.
result.ga: Tá aiféala orm ach ní féidir liom tíocht
result.orig: Tá aiféala orm ach ní féidir liom tíocht
result.html: Tá aiféala orm ach ní féidir liom tíochtI'm sorry, but I cannot come.
result.ponchtml: Tá aiféala orm aċ ní féidir liom tíoċtI'm sorry, but I cannot come.

result.eng: I'm not bad. [in aswer to 'how are you']
result.ga: Níl caill orm
result.orig: Níl caill orm
result.html: Níl caill ormI'm not bad. [in aswer to 'how are you']
result.ponchtml: Níl caill ormI'm not bad. [in aswer to 'how are you']

result.eng: I'm sorry but I'm working tonight.
result.ga: Tá brón orm ach tá mé ag obair anocht
result.orig: Tá brón orm ach tá mé ag obair anocht
result.html: Tá brón orm ach tá mé ag obair anochtI'm sorry but I'm working tonight.
result.ponchtml: Tá brón orm aċ tá mé ag obair anoċtI'm sorry but I'm working tonight.

result.eng: I'm very sorry.
result.ga: Tá an-bhrón orm
result.orig: Tá an-bhrón orm
result.html: Tá an-bhrón ormI'm very sorry.
result.ponchtml: Tá an-ḃrón ormI'm very sorry.

result.eng: I was afraid you'd got lost!
result.ga: Bhí faitíos orm go raibh tú imithe amú
result.orig: Bhí faitíos orm go raibh tú imithe amú
result.html: Bhí faitíos orm go raibh tú imithe amúI was afraid you'd got lost!
result.ponchtml: Ḃí faitíos orm go raiḃ tú imiṫe amúI was afraid you'd got lost!

result.eng: I'm sorry to hear that.
result.ga: Tá brón orm é sin a chloisteáil
result.orig: Tá brón orm é sin a chloisteáil
result.html: Tá brón orm é sin a chloisteáilI'm sorry to hear that.
result.ponchtml: Tá brón orm é sin a ċloisteáilI'm sorry to hear that.

result.eng: He looked at me with a sad expression.
result.ga: D'amharc sé orm agus dreach brónach air
result.orig: D'amharc sé orm agus dreach brónach air
result.html: D'amharc sé orm agus dreach brónach airHe looked at me with a sad expression.
result.ponchtml: D'aṁarc sé orm agus dreaċ brónaċ airHe looked at me with a sad expression.

result.eng: The whole thing is making me afraid.
result.ga: Tá an rud ar fad ag cur eagla orm
result.orig: Tá an rud ar fad ag cur eagla orm
result.html: Tá an rud ar fad ag cur eagla ormThe whole thing is making me afraid.
result.ponchtml: Tá an rud ar fad ag cur eagla ormThe whole thing is making me afraid.

result.eng: It scares me to my skin.
result.ga: Cuireann sé eagla mo chraicinn orm
result.orig: Cuireann sé eagla mo chraicinn orm
result.html: Cuireann sé eagla mo chraicinn ormIt scares me to my skin.
result.ponchtml: Cuireann sé eagla mo ċraicinn ormIt scares me to my skin.

result.eng: For some reason I was afraid of the dead dogs even though they didn't even move.
result.ga: Ar chúis éigin bhí eagla orm roimh na madraí marbha cé nach raibh cor astu
result.orig: Ar chúis éigin bhí eagla orm roimh na madraí marbha cé nach raibh cor astu
result.html: Ar chúis éigin bhí eagla orm roimh na madraí marbha cé nach raibh cor astuFor some reason I was afraid of the dead dogs even though they didn't even move.
result.ponchtml: Ar ċúis éigin ḃí eagla orm roiṁ na madraí marḃa cé naċ raiḃ cor astuFor some reason I was afraid of the dead dogs even though they didn't even move.

result.eng: My Lord knows what I've done.
result.ga: Tá a fhios ag mo Thiarna orm
result.orig: Tá a fhios ag mo Thiarna orm
result.html: Tá a fhios ag mo Thiarna ormMy Lord knows what I've done.
result.ponchtml: Tá a ḟios ag mo Ṫiarna ormMy Lord knows what I've done.

result.eng: I hate him more than the devil.
result.ga: Ní lú orm an diabhal ná é
result.orig: Ní lú orm an diabhal ná é
result.html: Ní lú orm an diabhal ná éI hate him more than the devil.
result.ponchtml: Ní lú orm an diaḃal ná éI hate him more than the devil.

result.eng: Nothing could scare me.
result.ga: Ní raibh eagla le cur orm
result.orig: Ní raibh eagla le cur orm
result.html: Ní raibh eagla le cur ormNothing could scare me.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ eagla le cur ormNothing could scare me.

result.eng: I don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.
result.ga: Níl feidhm orm aon lá oibre a dhéanamh le mo sholas Tá mé i mo sháith den tsaol
result.orig: Níl feidhm orm aon lá oibre a dhéanamh le mo sholas Tá mé i mo sháith den tsaol
result.html: Níl feidhm orm aon lá oibre a dhéanamh le mo sholas Tá mé i mo sháith den tsaolI don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.
result.ponchtml: Níl feiḋm orm aon lá oibre a ḋéanaṁ le mo ẛolas Tá mé i mo ẛáiṫ den tsaolI don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.
